TopicTitle: Hello from the "#1 Player on Raptr"

Articles.Content:
Hi folks:

Recently built a new computer with AMD hardware; this build ultimately involved a registration for the AMD Gaming Evolved portal (which has it's own browser interface) - This is a community for AMD hardware users that has a lot of enhancements to gameplay experience, record replays and clips, automatically links to Twitch, and also allows you to link other accounts like Steam for rewards and credits. In the process of doing this, it turns out that the Raptr feature of AMD's portal has identified me as the #1 KSP player on Raptr - which simply means that I've played a lot of Kerbal (and probably that the Raptr community doesn't have a very large user base). One of the advantages of the AMD Gaming Evolved portal is that it collects data from players and then offers the end user the option of optimizing their AMD hardware specifically for that game based on the results of the community data collection.

I was wondering if anyone could help me with the KSP forum: I would like to add a signature to my KSP forum account posts but dont find a way to do that. Help appreciated. Thanks.

Here's a screenshot of the portal, which I forgot to mention also includes a game overlay to activate clip and replay capture as well as automatic twitch streaming.

I will assist anyone with the AMD portal, overlay, and Raptr community features - kind of like an ambassador - until I get sick of doing that. Then someone else can do it.
